page.title: 07TOURISIM IN WOODLAND
page.content: Although Woodland is small it is an interesting village.There is only one residential inn others could be {encouraged}to take in{tourists. There are a lot of people who have friends who come from{other countries. Some people have relatives from Canada and Scotland who come for holidays. Children have exchange visits with children in Germany and France. If people came to stay in Woodland they could go in to Hamsterley Forest to see all the{trees}and{wildlife. They could also go to High Force Waterfall and Bowlees .There is also {trout fishing}in the reservoir. { Leisure Centres}are within easy reach at Bishop Auckland and Darlington. { Museums}in the area are Bowes, 2 railway museums and Beamish. Durham City with its{Castle}and{Cathedral}is only 23 miles away.
